canon_entry_schema.description: Schema for canon entries in CANON_INVENTORY.json

canonical_version.description: Canonical version (same as version field); intentionally redundant with 'version' to support version-guard tooling in consumer repos that needs an explicit canonical baseline field

local_version.description: Highest known consumer repo version if a local extension exists; null when no extension is present

local_extension.description: Whether any consumer repo has a local extension (local_version > canonical_version)

layer_up_status.description: Current status of layer-up processing for this file
